Fun game to play from time to time, especially with friends. 

TIPS !!: When u stop getting scared or start becoming a competitive killer, it s probably time to take a break from the game.

YouTube配信等で何かと話題のこのゲーム。面白いか面白くないかといえば、面白い。ただ運要素が強いかも。
結局敵も仲間も操作しているのは人間なので性格が出ます。釣られてすぐに助けに来てくれる人もいれば、全く救助に来てくれないで最悪そのまま死ぬなんてことも。。キラーも、トンネルと呼ばれる行為（ずっと1人にだけ執着して早期退場をさせてくるキラー）をしてくる人も多いです。運が良ければマッチ終了後”楽しかった！”と思えますが、運が悪い仲間やキラーに当たると本当にイライラします。ただし、それでもこのゲームを続けている理由としては、たまに気持ちの良い脱出ができたり特定パークが刺さったり等、思わず声が出てしまうような好プレーがある”かもしれない”という期待面が大きいからだと思います。
ただしキラー側は注意が必要です。このゲームはキラーが圧倒的に少なく、ランクが18等低い(開始当初20。1まである。数字が低くなるにつれて強い/うまいということになる)キラーが、サバイバー4人ともランク7などの慣れている人に当たってしまった場合は壊滅的です。一人とチェイスしてるとものの数分でマッチが終了します。ランクが低かったからしょうがないと言ってくれるサバイバーもいれば、EZ(イージー:簡単だった)と煽ってくるような連中もいます。この点からも、どんな人間と当たるかが運となります。
以上、自分が思ったことでした。ゲームシステム自体、かなり長く飽きることなくできる仕様でやりこみ要素もあるのでそこは助かります。

This game used to be so fun, but they buffed the killers too much, Freddy can go in the ground and it automatically gives you a trance, the huntress is broken, when you throw down a pallet, even if you dodge the hatchet, it still hits you regardless, the doctor you can legitally just spam the electric thing even if your not close you scream giving away your position, I can't beleive I'm saying this because I've been playing this game from the beginning, I started from console but switched to PC, but like I said I can't believe I'm saying this but they totally ruined this game, I have uninstalled it and will NEVER play this again. Sorry DBD we had a good run!!

First off, Dead by Daylight is a horror game with a good idea but poorly executed.

Pros:
 -Fun with friends
 -Suspenseful 
 -Good running simulator

Cons:
 -Killers are stupid broken and some killers make the really difficult and super stressful to say the least
 -Killers always have the advantage and are faster and stronger
 -One would think why not hide from them: well some killers such as the doctor can just weed you out and then find you and kill you 
 -Why not add a killer who has a stupid harpoon gun that shoots you and pulls you towards them because why not
 -Not worth $20
 -Finally the game is stupid addicting hence why I can't keep stop playing this dumb game

IF YOU LIKE STRESSING OUT WHILE PLAY A GAME BUY THIS RIGHT NOW
It's dumb asf, but I can't stop playing it. Would recommend to literally anyone. It takes a bit to learn how to play well, but once you have it, it's literally one of the best games ever.

I love this game which is why it's one of my most played games. From Jumpscares to Pallet Loops I've done it all. 

I will say that as a Survivor the most fun you'll have is once you have a decent understanding of the game and go against similar level Killers. Then you get to run them around but don't feel like you're safe doing so. 

The least fun you'll have is when you're a rank 20 that goes against a Killer that has all the meta perks and is very competent
Once you hit the higher ranks it gets more about getting enough points rather than having fun which is a little sad since there's no "unranked" mode.

When you first start you'll be scared anytime you hear that heartbeat and hide in a corner, but with time you may find yourself getting excited when you hear it.

5/7 would get yoinked off a gen by Myres again.
